article: It's Sunday today. Mr. Green goes out for a picnic. On the way  _  Mount Fang, he can't  find  the way. So he  has to  ask an old man near him for help. "Could you please tell me the way  to Mount Fang  ?"asks Mr. Green. "Go  _  this road, cross the Lang Park and turn right at the gate of the park. Go up the street to the end and you'll see it  _  your left. " says the old man. "How long will it take me to  get  there?" asks Mr. Green. The old man says nothing . Mr. Green feels a little angry . He goes away. After a while , the old man calls him, "Young man, you will get there in about half an hour. " "  _  didn't you tell me just now ?" asks Mr. Green. "I don't know how fastyou can walk.  _  I have to let you go, then I can tell you the  _  . "says the old man.
